thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Sylvie

author: Sylvie
title: Sylvie
text:
It would be better if we could just change the number of ticket required when we find a deal, just before doing the paiement. Actually, if you change the number of ticket required just before the paiement, you have to go through all the search process again.
Also, have the option to pay with 2 differents credit card. When 2 friends are travelling togheter, they want to book togheter to insure they have the same flights but pay on their own credit card. It's was possible to split the invoice n 2 credit cards.
